subtitle: An Italian recipe.

method.text: Cook the courgettes whole in boiling water until just tender. Drain well. Trim ends. Cut into thin strips.
Meanwhile, heat half the butter in a small frying pan. Saute the mushrooms for 5 min.
Melt the remaining butter in a bowl over a pan of simmering water. Add the egg yolk and lemon juice. Stir until thickened.
Add the courgettes and seasoning to the mushrooms. Remove from heat. Pour the sauce over the vegetables.
Return to a low heat to warm through but DO NOT BOIL. Serve.

title: Mushrooms and courgettes in lemon sauce
